mapper.sql: id, corp_id, qywx_mgr_id, qywx_mgr_name, qywx_cust_id, qywx_cust_name, avatar, `type`, remark, gender, add_time, union_id, `position`, corp_name, corp_full_name, external_profile, add_way, oper_userid, description, remark_corp_name, remark_mobiles, `state`, gmt_create, create_id, gmt_modified, modified_id, is_deleted, sessoin_status, agree_status, status_time
mapper.delete:
delete from zh_qywx_cust_rel where (qywx_mgr_id, qywx_cust_id) in
(#{item.qywxMgrId}, #{item.qywxCustId})
delete from zh_qywx_cust_rel where qywx_cust_id = #{qywxCustId} and qywx_mgr_id = #{qywxMgrId}
mapper.insert:
insert into zh_qywx_cust_rel (corp_id, qywx_mgr_id, qywx_mgr_name, qywx_cust_id, qywx_cust_name, avatar, `type`, gender, union_id, `position`, corp_name, corp_full_name, external_profile, remark, description, add_time, remark_corp_name, remark_mobiles, add_way, oper_userid, state, gmt_create, create_id, gmt_modified, modified_id, is_deleted) values
(#{custRel.corpId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{custRel.qywxMgrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.qywxMgrName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.qywxCustId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.qywxCustName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.avatar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.unionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.corpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.corpFullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.externalProfile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custRel.remarkCorpName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.remarkMobiles,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.addWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{custRel.operUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{custRel.state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custRel.gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custRel.createId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{custRel.gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{custRel.modifiedId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{custRel.isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER})
